title: CCTV captures 'Nihang Sikhs' attacking descendant of martyr Sukhdev Thapar in Ludhiana
selftext: Victim (also Shiv Sena Punjab leader) Sandeep Thapar Gora was brutally attacked with swords by two men dressed as Nihang Sikhs in Ludhiana. Sandeep Thapar has been admitted to the district hospital in a critical condition.
comments: no one is safe in this country…
This headline is incorrect, when Sukhdev Thapar's descendents have already told a journalist that they have absolutely no links with the guy who was attacked. Reporting it for misinformation
